posts.title: First Blog Post
posts.body: Welcome to the very first blog post on our mini blog! This post serves as an introduction to the platform and gives you a quick overview of what's to come. Weâ€™ll explore how React, MobX, and TypeScript come together to build modern web apps.

posts.title: React with TypeScriptReact with TypeScript
posts.body: React and TypeScript are a powerful combination for building scalable and maintainable frontend applications. In this post, we'll dive into how to type your components properly, use hooks with type safety, and build reusable form components using React Hook Form and Zod.

posts.title: MobX State Management
posts.body: Managing state in large applications can quickly become a headache. MobX offers a reactive and declarative way to handle state updates and side effects. In this article, we'll cover observable state, actions, and how to keep your state management logic clean and modular.
